channel.title: Coding an object to give you/remove skill experience

item.title: Coding an object to give you/remove skill experience
item.dc:creator: @Sublimexx Sublimexx
item.description:
@Sublimexx wrote:

Ill give it a try removeSkillXP doesn’t work…

Edit: Didn’t work… i’m gonna google it i’ll reply if i figure it out.

Edit: I read this…
addSkillXP (-200000000, 0);
that if you ADD minus experience it will work, however i tried it it does nothing.

Weird, I tried clicking the chest with that code entered… and i clicked it a few times, and then i disconnected and i was in fally park…? strange… anyone know this code or what? lol

Okay i realized that EVERY time i click the chest it disconnects me says
“[Sublime] serverobjs size 0”
“[Sublime] atObject: 2582, 3908 objectID: 3273”
“[Sublime] Fatal: couldn’t find connection vertex! Dropping packet.”
“[Sublime] Disconnected”
“[Sublime] Connected //me trying to reconnect”
“Null Disconnected (127.0.0.1)”

Please help me figure this out lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Coding an object to give you/remove skill experience
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I don’t think clicking.java deals with objects. Look in client.java for something like
If (objectID == 4156) {
// Stuff here
}

If you have a portal working somewhere in the game you are running type the object Id of that portal. If you see something like that, you can make the exact same code for you crate.
If (objectID == 355) {
if (c.playerRights > 1); {
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 1);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 2);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 3);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 4);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 5);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 6);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 7);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 8);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 9);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 10);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 11);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 12);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 13);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 14);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 15);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 16);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 17);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 18);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 19);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 20);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 21);
c.sM(“Have Fun! To reset your stats click the chest!”);
}
if (c.playerRights < 1);
{
c.triggerTele(3087, 3493, 0);
c.sM(“You are not staff get out of here!”);
c.killMyNPCs();
c.resetfollowers();
}
}

item.source: Coding an object to give you/remove skill experience

item.title: Coding an object to give you/remove skill experience
item.dc:creator: @Sublimexx Sublimexx
item.description:
@Sublimexx wrote:

I’m very new to coding, however i’ve been learning very well. Just about every problem i’ve solved on my own… However this one has me stumped. Basically i’m trying to make a crate give you all 99’s and a chest remove all your skill experience. It’s not a compiling error, it compiles fine, all my codes fine, however when you click the crate nothing happens.

Heres my code for clicking.java
if (c.playerRights > 1); {
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 1);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 2);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 3);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 4);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 5);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 6);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 7);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 8);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 9);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 10);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 11);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 12);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 13);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 14);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 15);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 16);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 17);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 18);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 19);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 20);
c.addSkillXP (200000000, 21);
c.sM(“Have Fun! To reset your stats click the chest!”);
}
if (c.playerRights < 1);
{
c.triggerTele(3087, 3493, 0);
c.sM(“You are not staff get out of here!”);
c.killMyNPCs();
c.resetfollowers();
}
break;

This is the spawning for the crate…
makeGlobalObject(2584, 3908, 355, 1, 10);
And this is the spawning for the chest…
makeGlobalObject(2582, 3908, 3273, 1, 10);

Now here’s a screenshot of the server when i click the crate (355) please note nothing happens ingame

Also i haven’t edited the clicking.java for the chest(3273)
i’ve just been trying to get the crate to work
Also it says “clicked ####” When you click just about anything.
For example i edited the case id of the house options
and made them a teleport to staff zone and created my own spirte.

case 74198 was the house options that i edited.
However when i click the crate it doesn’t say clicked 355…
Please help me figure this out, thanks

Read full topic
